StringProperty.Name: DebuggerConfigTargetApk
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the location of the Android Application (.apk) to be installed and debugged.

StringProperty.Name: DebuggerConfigLaunchActivity
StringProperty.Description: Override the default launch activity. If unset, debugger will use activity with 'android.intent.category.LAUNCHER' intent.

BoolProperty.Name: DebuggerConfigKeepAppData
BoolProperty.Description: Ensures that existing data remains for if the Application is re-installed.

StringProperty.Name: DebuggerConfigInstallerPackage
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the package name for an installer, allowing applications to pretend to originate from different marketplaces. e.g. Google Play (com.android.vending)

BoolProperty.Name: DebuggerPropCheckJni
BoolProperty.Description: Enable 'Check JNI' sanity checking. More info: http://android-developers.blogspot.co.uk/2011/07/debugging-android-jni-with-checkjni.html

BoolProperty.Name: DebuggerPropEglCallstack
BoolProperty.Description: Print a callstack to logcat output when a "call to OpenGL ES API with no current context (logged once per thread)" error occurs.
